<source lang="xml">
<settings>
  <redraw>true</redraw>                                       
  <color_change_time_start>0.5</color_change_time_start> 
  
  <zoom>
    <outline_color>DDDDDD</outline_color>
    <min>50</min>
    <background_zooms_to_top>true</background_zooms_to_top>
  </zoom>
  
  <small_map>
    <enabled>false</enabled>
  </small_map>
  
  <navigation_path>
    <enabled>false</enabled>
  </navigation_path>
  
  <area>
    <balloon_text>
      <![CDATA[{value}]]>
    </balloon_text>
    <color_hover>#CC0000</color_hover>
    <color_selected></color_selected>
    <disable_when_clicked>true</disable_when_clicked>
  </area>  
  
  <label>
    <balloon_text>                                            
      <![CDATA[]]>
    </balloon_text>
  </label>
</settings>
</source>
